name: OR_CASE_EQUIP_NEED
description: The OR_CASE_EQUIP_NEED table contains OR management system case surgical equipment.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the surgical equipment requested for the case.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_CMT
columns.description: A free-text comment about a piece of equipment.
